author: Saud Alawi
bio: Hi, my name is Saud and welcome to my website!
extendedBio: I am a web developer specialized in frontend development. I started learning web development in 2018 with HTML & CSS at first and then moved on to JavaScript and ReactJS framework. I focus on employing my JavaScript skills, CSS, HTML, and other tools to build websites and web applications. I also write tutorials and posts in my blog about topics related to anything I learned or am learning.
